entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checksum links in https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/blob/main/documentation/package-table.md#table fail #42008
  • Problem with LibraryImport Generated Code #42005

Closed

  • First-chance ArgumentOutOfRangeException in NuGetUtils.cs line #2183
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24357.1 #42007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused NuGetUtils.cs file #41987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix workload install or update with workload set specified in global.json #41983
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2490009 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
